promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young epic rabbit fighting-type holding a red and black shield. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Shieldillius, a chibi young epic rabbit fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Acme of Heroism-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word rabbit or fighting or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, rabbit-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: Shieldillius, a young hero adept at battling. In arenas, it quests for strength. Wielding Acme of Heroism-GX, no foe is too strong!
